name: piano
look_description: It is a large wooden player piano. The ivory keys seem relatively untouched, which makes you think that this piano was rarely played. The piano contains a cartridge slot that can be used to insert player piano cartridges.

touch.text: You tap one of the keys and jump as a jarringly loud note reverberates through the house.

play.text: You tap one of the keys and jump as a jarringly loud note reverberates through the house.

smell.text: The piano almost smells nice, like wood and varnish.

cartridge.text: If you place a player piano cartridge in this slot, the piano will play the song.
